test_results.reference_range: Normal: 12-14; Increased from unit volume: Decreased platelet count, Thrombocytopenia, Prolonged bleeding time; Pseudothromocytosis (increased variation in size of platelets), increased liver function tests, bone marrow hypoplasia, decreased immune response; Lower than normal range may indicate deficiency disorders such as Vitamin B12 deficiency disorders, Bone Marrow failure or Immune system disorders.
